org.nanoko.coffee.mill.mojos.processResources

Class ResolveDependenciesMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.nanoko.coffee.mill.mojos.AbstractCoffeeMillMojo
        • org.nanoko.coffee.mill.mojos.processResources.ResolveDependenciesMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public class ResolveDependenciesMojo
extends AbstractCoffeeMillMojo
    Copy `js` project dependencies to the target/libs folder. Copy `css` project dependencies to the target/web folder. The location can be changed using the webDir and libsDir option
